mapper.select: select year,team, (win + draw + lose) as round, win, draw, lose , (win*3 + draw) as winscore , gain, lost, (gain-lost) as range , assist, foul, row_number () over (order by (win * 3 + draw) desc, gain desc) as rank from soccer_team

select ps.playernum, ps.tname, ps.pname, ps.pnumber, ps.pimage, sp.*, row_number () over (order by sp.gain desc, sp.round asc) as ranking from player_soccer ps, soccer_player sp where ps.playernum = sp.playernum

select ps.playernum, ps.tname, ps.pname, ps.pnumber, ps.pimage, sp.*, row_number () over (order by sp.assist desc, sp.round asc) as ranking from player_soccer ps, soccer_player sp where ps.playernum = sp.playernum

select ps.playernum, ps.tname, ps.pname, ps.pnumber, ps.pimage, sp.*, row_number () over (order by sp.mom desc, sp.round asc) as ranking from player_soccer ps, soccer_player sp where ps.playernum = sp.playernum
